A4.text: Terence Patrick O'Neill (30 July 1938 â€“ 16 November 2019) was a British photographer, known for documenting the fashions, styles, and celebrities of the 1960s.

A5.text: He was awarded an honorary fellowship of the Royal Photographic Society in 2004 and the society's Centenary Medal in 2011.
